txt.en: 'Please, stay and speak with me. I am quite upset! My friends Brunstan and Sperling are quarrelling, and I am afraid they will hurt each other.\n\n'You are a great warrior, and I am sure they would listen to you if you told them to stop fighting. Will you come with me?'
'Oh dear! If you tell Sperling and Brunstan that it was actually our other friend who took Sperling's toy sword, they will both turn on him.\n\n'Is there nothing you can do to help?'
'Oh, thank you, kind [placeholder]! Let us go at once!'
Getfleda, a little girl from Eaworth, is troubled by the conflict between her friends, Brunstan and Sperling.
You helped break up a fight between Getfleda's friends
Accompany Getfleda to help break up a fight between her friends

Getfleda is in the northern part of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nGetfleda asked you to help break up a fight between her friends Brunstan and Sperling. You should speak with her again when you are ready to leave.
Getfleda is in the northern part of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should speak with Getfleda regarding the dispute between her friends Brunstan and Sperling.
